content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions, but the three most successful athletes of the 1988 Winter Olympics, in terms of medals won, were:

1. Matti Nykänen (Finland) - He won three gold medals in ski jumping (normal hill, large hill, and team event) and a silver medal in the individual large hill event.

2. Yvonne van Gennip (Netherlands) - She won three gold medals in speed skating (3000m, 5000m, and team pursuit) and set a new world record in the 3000m.

3. Alberto Tomba (Italy) - He won two gold medals in alpine skiing (giant slalom and slalom) and became one of the most successful skiers in Olympic history.
